metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39633 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In gre_handle_offloads of ip_gre.c, there is a possible page fault due to an invalid memory access. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-150694665References: Upstream kernel

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39633` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1115-aws - 4.15.0-1115.122~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1126-azure - 4.15.0-1126.139~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
